snippet: A Task party, a spontaneous group-art concept developed by Oliver Herring, unfolded with exuberance in Madison Square Park.
abstract: Artist Oliver Herring's Task art party in Madison Square Park unfolds with participants turning odds and ends into acts of collaborative creation in the evening hours.
lead_paragraph: A Task party, a spontaneous group-art concept developed by Oliver Herring, unfolded with exuberance in Madison Square Park.

headline.seo: Oliver Herring at a Task party at Madison Square Park
headline.main: Making Art on the Spot and on the Fly
headline.print_headline: Making Art on the Spot and on the Fly
